title: Multiplying Each Root
speech: 10, the square root of 6 p cubed end root times 3, the square root of 18 p end root is equal to 30, the square root of 108 p to the fourth end root

title: Simplifying the Product
text: $$\sqrt{108p^4}=6p^2 \sqrt{3}$$. The simplified form of the above product is $$30\times6 p^2 \sqrt{3}$$ $$=$$ $$180p^2 \sqrt{3}$$
speech: the square root of 108 p to the fourth end root is equal to 6 p squared the square root of 3 . The simplified form of the above product is  30 times 6 p squared the square root of 3   is equal to  , 180 p squared the square root of 3
